review_details: Home cooked Good food with friendly staff great Lamb dish, and amazing complementary ice cream with coconut cake.

Very clean hotel - each rooms and bathroom spotless , great and large selection of food each day even for fussy eaters. Most friendly staff I ever came across. Last day they extend our stay free of charge, we didn’t need to check out till 7pm! Absolutely amazing hotel for families and couples ️️️️️
reviewFor: Atrium Platinum Luxury Resort Hotel & Spa

review_details: 4/5 hours trip with fishing , snorkelling and delicious fish on BBQ amazing experience for all family members. Amazing stuff
